mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM rvw_cmt WHERE rvw_no = #{rvw_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM rvw_cmt WHERE cmt_no = #{cmt_no} AND usr_nm = #{usr_nm}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rvw_cmt (usr_id, rvw_no, pcmt_no, cmt_cont, usr_nm, reg_date, mdf_date) VALUES (#{usr_id}, #{rvw_no}, #{pcmt_no}, #{cmt_cont}, #{usr_nm}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT cmt_no, rvw_no, pcmt_no, cmt_cont, usr_nm, reg_date, mdf_date FROM rvw_cmt WHERE rvw_no = #{rvw_no} ORDER BY reg_date ASC, cmt_no ASC
